casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Titus BATTS No. 104P11-9 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Titus Batts, for Batts, Titus.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 29th of March 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."

Ervin, J. recused
